data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Richard Ledezma (Eindhoven) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, Jeroen Manschot blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Eindhoven.
The away team have replaced Bryan Smeets with Mario Engels. This is the first substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
In the minute 64, Henk Fraser (Sparta) is making a second substitution, with Reda Kharchouch replacing Lennart Thy.
Chukwunonso Madueke is replacing Richard Ledezma for Eindhoven at Philips Stadion.
Roger Schmidt is making the team's second substitution at Philips Stadion with Donyell Malen replacing Mario Gotze.
In the minute 64, Cody Gakpo is replacing Eran Zahavi for the home team.
At Philips Stadion, Sven Mijnans has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ibrahim Sangare is replacing Pablo Rosario for Eindhoven at Philips Stadion.
In the minute 78, An attacking Eindhoven player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Donyell Malen gives Eindhoven a 1-0 lead in Eindhoven.
Denzel Dumfries is on a sub for Jordan Teze for Eindhoven.
In the minute 81, Henk Fraser is making the team's third substitution at Philips Stadion with Jeffry Fortes replacing Deroy Duarte.
Sparta's Mario Engels has been booked in Eindhoven.
Henk Fraser (Sparta) is making a fourth substitution, with Aaron Meijers replacing Sven Mijnans.
In the minute 83, Aaron Meijers for Sparta has been booked by Jeroen Manschot and receives a first yellow card.
The away team replace Abdou Harroui with Danzell Gravenberch.
The match has come to a close in Eindhoven. The final score is 1-0.
